1665910.name: KIDDO
1665910.description:
KIDDO is a point-and-click adventure game packed with clever puzzles, a striking hand-drawn art style, and an ironic sense of humor... because if you’re going to hit rock bottom, you might as well do it with style.

The story follows Kiddo, a socially isolated person who has truly mastered the art of doing nothing.

Time has slipped through your fingers, and you’re still there—glued to your sofa, watching life slip away like the last slice of pizza at a party you weren’t invited to. Your motivation? Gone. Your friends? Ghosted. Your job? Let’s not even go there. Even your house is giving up on itself.

But hey, it’s not all bad. There’s still one person who believes in you. Well… kinda.

Can you muster the strength to get up and turn things around? Or at least shower? Are you ready to give life another shot?

Come on, Kiddo. It’s time. (No, really. Your sofa is starting to smell.)

THIS GAME IS FOR YOU IF:

✔ You’re bored. Like, staring-at-the-ceiling bored.
✔ You enjoy puzzles that make you question your intelligence.
✔ You appreciate a good story with just the right amount of existential crisis.
✔ You love hand-drawn art because pixels are so mainstream.
✔ You, too, have found yourself in "the dark hole" (no, not your laundry pile).
1665910.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
